questions.question: Which layer of the OSI model does SSL operate in?
What is a “man-in-the-middle” attack in SSL?

answers.a: An attack where a hacker intercepts and alters SSL communication between a user and a serve
answers.b: An attack where a hacker gains unauthorized access to a server through SSL
answers.c: An attack where a hacker installs malware on a user’s computer through SSL
answers.d: An attack where a hacker steals a user’s SSL certificate
